copy.title: Baking
copy.subtitle: Fire-Tending
copy.instruction0: Click beneath a fire to make it hotter.
copy.instruction1: Careful not to make the fires too hot, or your treats might burn!
copy.instruction2: Don't let the fires get too cold, or they may go out!
copy.start0: Time to bake! Keep those fires stoked.
copy.start1: Are you ready to run the oven?
copy.too_hot0: Watch out! That one is getting too hot!
copy.too_cold0: Oops, that fire is starting to go out!
copy.too_cold1: That one could use a little more heat.
copy.flame_out1: Ack, one of the flames went out!
copy.DulcieEncourage0: Nice job! The heat is just right!
copy.DulciePoor0: Pretty good for a beginner. Heating the oven just right is hard!
copy.DulciePoor1: Those flames are really finicky! You'll do better next time.
copy.DulciePoor2: Baking can be challenging, but don't worry, it just takes practice!
copy.DulciePoor3: Don't give up! Your next dish will be better for sure.
copy.DulcieGood1: Good work! Keep it up, and you'll get even better!
copy.DulcieGood2: Hey, good work! I'm proud of you!
copy.DulcieGreat2: Goodness, you have a knack for this!
copy.DulcieAwesome1: You have gotten FANTASTIC at this!
